title: Assyriological Studies
additional-notes: The renewal record for the first renewal shown here was filed under Books, and does not mention Assyriological Studies.  The first volume whose CCE renewal record specifically mentions this serial is volume 7, published in 1940.

This is a monographic series, so before concluding an issue or volume is in the public domain, search for renewals for it under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked volume or issue titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
